articles.title: Kosovo, Albania to cooperate in development of Vlora LNG terminal
articles.description: The governments of Kosovo and Albania signed a Memorandum of Cooperation for the development of the Lungomare LNG terminal in Albania's Vlora, Kosovo prime minister's office said.

articles.title: Luxembourg to invest 35 mln euro in Kosovo's development in 2023-2025
articles.description: The government of Luxembourg plans to provide 35 million euro ($35.7 million) in financing to Kosovo in the 2023-2025 period in order to back the country's development, Kosovo's prime minister office said.

articles.title: Kosovo's GDP growth slows to 4.87% y/y in Q1 - prelim estimate
articles.description: Kosovo's gross domestic product (GDP) rose by a real 4.87% year-on-year in the first quarter of 2022, after increasing by 6.36% in the previous three-month period, the statistical office said.

articles.title: EBRD, EU investing 6 mln euro in energy efficiency project in Kosovo's Prizren
articles.description: The Federal Reserve chairman gathers with policy makers this week at Jackson Hole where they face the prospect that rising prices could be a feature of the landscape, a rapid about-face from a time when they worried about inflation being too low.
